hero.description: Straight from our family farm to your table. Experience the authentic taste of nature.

about.title: Our Honey Farm
about.imageAlt: Our honey farm beehives in spring with blooming trees
about.description1: Nestled in the heart of nature, our honey farm is home to thriving bee colonies that produce some of the finest honey you'll ever taste. Our beehives are carefully placed in pristine locations, surrounded by blooming trees and wildflowers, ensuring our bees have access to the best nectar sources throughout the season.
about.description2: We take pride in our sustainable beekeeping practices, maintaining the delicate balance between nature and tradition. Each hive is managed with care and respect, allowing our bees to thrive while producing pure, natural honey that captures the essence of our local flora.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description1: At our family-owned honey farm, we're dedicated to producing the finest quality honey while maintaining sustainable beekeeping practices. For over two decades, we've been nurturing our bees and harvesting pure, natural honey that brings the authentic taste of nature to your table.
mission.description2: We believe in the importance of protecting our pollinators and promoting biodiversity. Every jar of honey represents our commitment to environmental stewardship and traditional beekeeping methods.

step1.description: We carefully maintain our bee colonies, ensuring they have access to diverse flower sources.

meta.title: Distance Contract | Honey Farm
meta.description: Terms and conditions of the distance contract.

intro.description1: As the sale of goods offered by Honey Farm takes place through an offer placed on the Internet at our website, in accordance with Article 10 of the Consumer Rights Protection Law (CRPL) of the Republic of Latvia, in this case, when the buyer places an order, a DISTANCE CONTRACT is concluded between the buyer and the seller.
intro.description2: This Distance Contract (hereinafter - the Contract) is concluded between the owner of the online trading site Honey Farm and the Buyer who places an order and makes a purchase on the online trading site.

terms.title: Contract Terms
list: The contract is concluded when the Buyer has placed an order and, in accordance with these terms, has made payment for the goods.
By placing an order, the Buyer confirms that they have read, understood and fully agree to the Contract and its terms.

The Seller has the right to restrict the Buyer's use of the online trading site services without warning if the Seller believes that the Buyer may violate or violates the Contract terms, attempts to harm the Seller, the operation or security of the online trading site, or third parties.
All product prices on the online trading site are indicated including value added tax of 21%. Product delivery service costs are not included in the indicated product price.

payment.title: Payment Methods
payment.description: Payment for the ordered goods and chosen delivery service can be made in the following ways:
methods: Receiving a prepayment invoice and making a bank transfer
Immediately after placing the order with Visa/MasterCard cards or Swedbank, Citadele, SEB bank and Luminor bank internet banking

delivery.title: Delivery Methods
methods: Venipak parcel machine or Pickup point
Courier delivers the ordered goods to the address specified by the Buyer in Riga, by prior arrangement
At the Seller's retail location in store

receiving.title: Receiving and Delivery of Goods
conditions: If the Buyer has indicated store pickup as the delivery method, it must be collected within 3 (three) working days from the moment the Seller has confirmed that the order is ready for collection. The product is not reserved for longer.

The Buyer is obliged to ensure that the person specified in the order is at the address specified in the order at the time of delivery of the goods, presents an identity document to the courier, accepts the goods without delay, signs the invoice, makes notes on the invoice.

withdrawal.title: Right of Withdrawal
withdrawal.description: The Buyer has the right to withdraw from the product within 14 (fourteen) calendar days from the moment of receiving the Product by sending a withdrawal letter to the Seller. The Seller sends the withdrawal letter form to the Buyer by email upon the Buyer's request.

conditions.title: Withdrawal Conditions
list: The buyer has the right to withdraw from the contract within 14 calendar days and return the product purchased in the online store back to the seller
When withdrawing from the purchase, the consumer is responsible for maintaining the quality and safety of the product during the period of exercising the right of withdrawal
We recommend keeping the original packaging of the product
The seller reserves the right to withhold compensation or refuse to accept the product if it is damaged, not in full configuration or has otherwise lost its original appearance
The Buyer's obligation is to return the product to the Seller within 7 (seven) days after sending the withdrawal letter
The Seller returns the full value of the returned product (delivery costs not included) to the Buyer within 30 (thirty) days after accepting the product
Product return costs are covered by the Buyer

returns.title: Returns Policy
returns.description: We want you to be completely satisfied with your purchase. If you're not happy with your order, you can return it within 14 days of receipt.

process.title: Return Process
steps: Contact us via email or phone to inform us about the return
Receive the return form and instructions
Package the item securely in its original packaging
Send the item back using your preferred shipping method
Once received, we'll inspect the item and process your refund

conditions.title: Return Conditions
list: Items must be unused and in their original packaging
All seals and labels must be intact
Products must not have been opened (for food safety)
Return shipping costs are the responsibility of the customer
Items must be returned within 14 days of receipt

refunds.title: Refunds
refunds.description: Once we receive your return, we'll process your refund according to the following terms:
terms: Refunds will be processed within 14 days of receiving the return
The original purchase price will be refunded (excluding delivery costs)
Refunds will be made to the original payment method
We'll notify you by email when your refund has been processed
